name: Vision Board
summary: A visual representation tool to define and manifest a hazy direction for your future.
explanation: A Vision Board is a visualization tool used to define a hazy direction for your future. It typically involves creating a collage of images, words, and affirmations that represent your goals, dreams, and desired life outcomes. The power of vision boards lies in keeping your aspirations visible and top-of-mind, leveraging the psychological principle that visualization can help manifest goals. While similar to a Vision Grid, a vision board tends to be more visual and creative, whereas a vision grid is more structured and analytical.

references.title: The Scientific Reason Why Vision Boards Work
